description: Main entry point and app setup for a Flutter mobile application, including authentication flow, theming, routing, and stub pages.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget that builds the MaterialApp with theme, routes, and home screen.

classes.name: _AuthGate
classes.description: Widget that displays either the login page or the rooms list depending on authentication state.

classes.name: LoginPage
classes.description: Stub login page with form to simulate user login.

classes.name: _LoginPageState
classes.description: State management for LoginPage, handling form, submission, and navigation.

classes.name: RegisterPage
classes.description: Stub registration page with form to simulate user registration.

classes.name: _RegisterPageState
classes.description: State management for RegisterPage, handling form, submission, and navigation.

classes.name: LoyaltyPage
classes.description: Stub page displaying mock loyalty information and user greeting.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, initializes Flutter bindings, loads environment variables, sets up authentication, and runs the app.

methods.name: _buildTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns a ThemeData object with custom theming using color seed from Material 3.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp, applying theme, routes, and initial home widget.

methods.name: _AuthGate.build
methods.description: Determines whether to show login or rooms list based on authentication state.

methods.name: _LoginPageState._submit
methods.description: Handles login form submission, calling AuthService, handling navigation or errors.

methods.name: _RegisterPageState._submit
methods.description: Handles registration form submission, calling AuthService, and navigating back on success.
